subject: Basketball
Basketball (College)
Coaches and Managers
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Isiah Thomas was fired by Florida International University as its basketball coach on Friday, and Donnie Walsh, Thomas’s successor as the Knicks’ president, began seeking work with another franchise.
snippet: Isiah Thomas was fired by Florida International University as its basketball coach on Friday, and Donnie Walsh, Thomas’s successor as the Knicks’ president, began seeking work with another franchise.
